titleStmt.title: Short memorials of Thomas Lord Fairfax written by himself.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Fairfax, Brian, 1633-1711.

notesStmt.note: Appended: Thomas Lord Fairfax, his epitaph made by the Duke of Buckingham.
